Zeyad Etman's Reviews > Math, Better Explained: Learn to Unlock Your Math Intuition

Jan 27, 2017books

Math, Better Explained: Learn to Unlock Your Math Intuition by Kalid Azad


The Greatest book of ‘Aha!’ Moments in math i’ve ever read.
the best thing i liked in the book that kalid didn’t fill it with boring details that take us far away from the main point, another thing illustrations make it easy to understand, i finished it in ‘E’day :D

I think my next book will be calculus better explained.
